original_text: As for the horn that was broken, in place of which four others arose, four kingdoms shall arise from his nation, but not with his power.
korean_text: 이 뿔이 꺾이고 그 대신에 네 뿔이 났은즉 그 나라 가운데에서 네 나라가 일어나되 그의 권세만 못하리라

sentences.original_text: As for the horn that was broken
in place of which four others arose
sentences.korean_translation: 그 자리에 네 개의 다른 뿔이 일어났고

sentences.original_text: four kingdoms shall arise from his nation
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 나라에서 네 왕국이 일어날 것이지만
